prompt: make me a website showing different workouts and gym equipments
refinedPrompt: Create a comprehensive fitness website that showcases various workouts and gym equipment. Include sections for different muscle groups, such as arms, legs, chest, back, and core. Provide detailed descriptions and images of each exercise, along with the targeted muscles and proper form. Showcase a wide range of gym equipment, from free weights to machines, with explanations of their use and benefits. Incorporate a beginner's guide to help users get started with a fitness routine. Add a blog section with articles on nutrition, wellness, and motivation.
